data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wu, Shipher (2018): Discovery of the genus Pseudepione Inoue, 1943 in Taiwan, with description of a new species (Lepidoptera: Geometridae: Ennominae). Zootaxa 4486 (1): 96-100, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4486.1.10|9 occurrences
